content: अरातिः [न राति ददाति सुखं, रा-क, न. त.] {@--1@} An enemy, foe; देशः सोयमरातिशोणितजलैर्यस्मिन्ह्रदाः पूरिताः <ls>Ve. 3. 31</ls>; (in the Veda) non-offering (of sacrifices), stinginess, hardness, malignity, malevolence, failure or adversity; malignity personified; evil spirit whose aim it was to defeat the good intentions and disturb the happiness of man (used in {%<ab>f.</ab>%}). {@--2@} The number six. {@--3@} The sixth position (in astronomy).
